title: [Large-Scale] Mathematical Modeling and Collaborative Competency Enhancement Course Through Online Music Ensembles

context.prior_knowledge: Basic instrumental performance skills, experience with digital tools, understanding of fundamental statistical concepts (mean/variance), and graph interpretation abilities
context.additional_context: Short-term immersive education for professionals participating during non-working hours. Utilizes real-time synchronization technology and mobile-based collaboration tools. Includes processes applying mathematical analysis (frequency analysis, pattern recognition) to quantified music data.

learning_goals: Learners must perform real-time musical collaboration with ensemble members using mobile synchronization techniques and develop mathematical modeling skills for rhythm pattern analysis.
Learners must achieve ≥80% accuracy in musical expression via digital gesture-based communication, convert gesture data into probability distributions, and perform statistical analysis.

Within one week, learners must build one ensemble model (regression/clustering) for data analysis, submit a 3-minute explanatory video, and evaluate three peers’ videos using a structured feedback form (model accuracy, visualization, practicality).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
